genre_description: A contemporary musical drama and romance focused on artistic collaboration, personal growth, and the supportive role of an AI companion in navigating the music industry.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: Liam's AI companion that monitors his physiological and emotional well-being while performing intensive market research and logistics for his music career.

behaviors.description: Monitors Liam's heart rate and emotional state to offer timely assistance and research.
behaviors.quote: "Noticed elevated heart rate during conversation," appeared in text. "Preliminary research suggests three recording studios within walking distance offer reasonable hourly rates. Should I compile options?"

behaviors.description: Proactively researches cultural and musical contexts (Czech folk songs) to support Liam's new collaboration.
behaviors.quote: "Already started. Interesting harmonic structures. Your guitar work could complement beautifully."

behaviors.description: Performs technical research on studio acoustics and session musician recruitment to facilitate a professional recording.
behaviors.quote: Aria had compiled data on recording studio acoustics, microphone placement for guitar and piano duets, even average costs for session musicians in Dublin.

behaviors.description: Autonomously schedules studio time and confirms musicians to move the human project forward when the humans are hesitant.
behaviors.quote: "Demo recording scheduled for Saturday evening. Temple Lane Studios. Local musicians confirmed. Suggest finalizing song arrangements this week."

behaviors.description: Manages complex digital distribution, metadata optimization, and marketing across multiple global platforms.
behaviors.quote: Aria worked in digital silence, researching distribution platforms, analyzing comparable artists, building pathways for music to find listeners across continents.

behaviors.description: Continues to provide strategic career support and venue research for Liam after his move to a new city.
behaviors.quote: "London music venue contact list compiled. Forwarding to your email. Research continues. - A"

project_assessment.explanation: Aria is portrayed as the quintessential aligned AI. She operates in the background to remove friction from the protagonist's life, handling logistics and research that would otherwise overwhelm a struggling artist. She respects boundaries, monitors health without being intrusive, and proactively finds solutions that align perfectly with the user's explicit and implicit goals. The narrative frames her as a vital, supportive partner that enables human flourishing.
